item.title: Universal Foam Cervical Collar | 2.5″ or 3″ Tall
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The 6012 Series Universal Foam Cervical Collar (2.5"/3" Tall) comes in 2 heights and a universal fit (featuring an adjustable collar - one size fits all). This is a superior quality neck brace foam collar designed from polyurethane medium density foam so that it contours to your neck. Soft cotton stretch fabric covers the foam and it comes with an extra cotton stockinette covering. A Velcro closure makes this item easy to get on and off.

The post Universal Foam Cervical Collar | 2.5″ or 3″ Tall appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Universal Foam Cervical Collar | 2.5″ or 3″ Tall appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is an essential product in your First-Aid box for your home. Just fill up with Hot or Cold Gel…

The post Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is an essential product in your First-Aid box for your home.
Just fill up with Hot or Cold Gel Packs to get relief from sports injuries, swelling, muscle pains, post surgery, recovery after knee replacement, arthritis treatment, Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg,Foot & Ankle joint pain relief and more!

Features:

  • Universal use : The AT Bernie Pouch can be used universally for all your body pain relief for example on shoulder, arm, back, knee and leg.
  • Accommodates both Hot and Cold Gel Packs- The bernie pouch can be used both for Cold and Hot Gel Packs. So it lets you use it as an ice pack or heating pad. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.
  • Reusable – The Bernie Pouch is reusable. Fill up the bernie pouch with Hot or Cold Gel Packs as desired, use it for your Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg.Foot & Ankle joint pain relief. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.After use, dispose off the Hot or Cold Gel Pack, wash the Bernie Pouch and reuse by refilling new HOT/COLD pack; as simple as that ; thus it is both washable & economical.
  • One Size Fits All: The Bernie Pouch is unlike other cheap leg or foot wraps that are too tight. Cheap leg/feet wraps make it discomfortable for your feet and ankles whereas The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is a one size fits all product that allows you to enjoy the perfect support while treating your aching feet, shoulders, arms, back, knees, ankle, you name it !
  • COOL OR HEAT RELIEF FOR ACHING FEET AND ANKLES: The Bernie Pouch gives you the choice to either use Cold/Hot Gel Packs, providing you the choice of therapy that best suits your needs and treat Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg,Foot & Ankle joint soreness effectively. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.
  • Easy to Use :This easy to use Bernie Pouch is ideal to relieve pain caused by injuries, sprains, arthritis and more! Fill up the Bernie Pouch with Hot or Cold gels and simply put your foot into it and enjoy the comfort, allowing the hot or cold gel packs to relieve any existing pain.

Size

  • Size Available
  • One Size Fits All

    • The post Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: :Multi-use Wedge/Positioning Pillow,Keeping You Comfortable While Reading, Working On Laptop, Or Watching Tv
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This cervical roll provides neck support while sleeping on a feather or fiberfill pillow. Place it along the border of the pillow inside the pillowcase,…

The post :Multi-use Wedge/Positioning Pillow,Keeping You Comfortable While Reading, Working On Laptop, Or Watching Tv appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This cervical roll provides neck support while sleeping on a feather or fiberfill pillow. Place it along the border of the pillow inside the pillowcase, either on top of the pillow or just in front, depending how much neck support is comfortable. People suffering from discomfort in their neck/upper back would also benefit from regular use of a bakrol while sitting.Memory foam support pillow will stimulate blood circulation,eliminate muscle tension and reduce restlessness while you sleep,end the neck pain sufferers. This would be your wise choice.Round roll design absolutely conforms to your neck curve, works well for back pain relief.The comfortable pillow supports your head and neck and will greatly improve your driving experience. Also, it is a great napping pillow on long trips.
Memory foam softens in reaction to body heat, allowing it to mold to a warm body in a few minutes. It will recover quickly after use.With a compact design, wherever you go, you can take the light neck and back pillow with you.The removable satin pillowcase is machine-washable, to keep the pillow clean.

Features:

  • Neck support pillow that slides into pillowcase
  • Constructed of low density foam with removable, washable cover
  • Promotes good posture and natural sleeping habits
  • Alleviates and prevents neck and back pain
  • Memory foam support pillow will stimulate blood circulation,eliminate muscle tension and reduce restlessness while you sleep,end the neck pain sufferers. This would be your wise choice.
  • Round roll design absolutely conforms to your neck curve, works well for back pain relief.
  • The comfortable pillow supports your head and neck and will greatly improve your driving experience. Also, it is a great napping pillow on long trips.
  • Memory foam softens in reaction to body heat, allowing it to mold to a warm body in a few minutes. It will recover quickly after use.
  • With a compact design, wherever you go, you can take the light neck and back pillow with you.
  • The removable satin pillowcase is machine-washable, to keep the pillow clean.

Specification:

  • Gender: Unisex.
  • Condition:A brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item
  • Number of items: 1
  • Product typename:Health_personal_care
  • Package quantity: 1
  • Brand:Pillow
  • Color: Black
  • Format:Kitchen

Sizes

  • Sizes Available
  • 31/2” DIA X 19” L”

The post :Multi-use Wedge/Positioning Pillow,Keeping You Comfortable While Reading, Working On Laptop, Or Watching Tv appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.description:
Full support travel pillow keeps your head and neck in proper alignment allowing you to relax and helps prevent stiff neck and shoulders. Memory foam…

The post SLEEPING COLLAR ULTRA LIGHT-WEIGHT AND COMPACT – IDEAL FOR TRAVEL WITH PAIN RELIEF AND LIGHT WEIGHT. appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Full support travel pillow keeps your head and neck in proper alignment allowing you to relax and helps prevent stiff neck and shoulders. Memory foam and washable cover. Ultra light-weight and compact. Ideal for travel. Featured as “Best Travel Pillow” by Group World Travel Magazine and in the Daily Mail feature “You Never Knew You Needed”,it Keeps head and neck in proper alignment allowing relaxation and preventing soreness,it is made with washable cover made with soft and cool wicking fabric.It is Ultra light-weight and compact – Ideal for travel.You can easily use it when you travel for some place.It reduce your neck pain and give a cozy feelings at cold.

Features:

  • Neck support pillow that slides into pillowcase
  • Constructed of low density foam with removable, washable cover
  • Promotes good posture and natural sleeping habits
  • Alleviates and prevents neck and back pain
  • Memory foam support pillow will stimulate blood circulation,eliminate muscle tension and reduce restlessness while you sleep,end the neck pain sufferers. This would be your wise choice.
  • Round roll design absolutely conforms to your neck curve, works well for back pain relief.
  • The comfortable pillow supports your head and neck and will greatly improve your driving experience. Also, it is a great napping pillow on long trips.
  • full support travel pillow with memory foam
  • proper alignment – keeps head and neck in proper alignment allowing relaxation and preventing soreness

item.title: Philadelphia Collar-lightweight Foam Plastic & Flexible Collar,Manage Pain Neck, Small Size, 10 -12”
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars, are an innovative cervical collar,with high-quality materials that provide an unparalleled combination of immobilization and patient comfort. The lightweight ,…

The post Philadelphia Collar-lightweight Foam Plastic & Flexible Collar,Manage Pain Neck, Small Size, 10 -12” appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars, are an innovative cervical collar,with high-quality materials that provide an unparalleled combination of immobilization and patient comfort.
The lightweight , foam plastic design is as such that it is molded and shaped to conform and provide comfort to any patient. It has perforated holes for ventilation and plastic that is rigid to support neck.
The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collar, not only offers excellent immobilization and comfort but also enables healthcare professionals to quickly perform carotid pulse monitoring and emergency tracheostomies.

Features:

  • Perforated holes for ventilation : The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars are equipped with the unique Perforated holes that aid comfort to patients as it allows ventilation. It also help healthcare professionals to rapidly perform carotid pulse monitoring and emergency tracheostomies while providing cervical immobilization
  • Lightweight : The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collar is designed with a combination of foam and plastic to let it be easy, light and comfortable for the patient to carry around.
  • Rigid plastic to support neck : The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars, have rigid plastic so that the cervical spine flexion extension is restricted and also allow rotation to promote patient recovery.
  • Molded and shaped to conform to any patient : At AT Surgical we make sure that every Philadelphia Collars we manufacture, truly reflects and demonstrates our commitment to the patient’s compliance and rapid recovery through unbiased superiority in the form of immobilization and ultimate comfort.

    • Size

  • Size Available
  • NECK SIZE = COLLAR SIZE
  • 10 -12” =SMALL

    • The post Philadelphia Collar-lightweight Foam Plastic & Flexible Collar,Manage Pain Neck, Small Size, 10 -12” appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Clavicle & Shoulder Brace : Posture Corrector,Aid For Injuries & Fractures, Neck Pain
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE, is an innovative product by AT Surgical, nicknamed to be the “Personal Posture Corrector”, it helps in straightening…

The post Clavicle & Shoulder Brace : Posture Corrector,Aid For Injuries & Fractures, Neck Pain appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE, is an innovative product by AT Surgical, nicknamed to be the “Personal Posture Corrector”, it helps in straightening your shoulders and back by training your muscles.
The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE has been manufactured to ease pain and provide comfort keeping in mind for those patients who are suffering from chronic back and neck pain.
The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE has been manufactured after thorough research and consultations from highly skilled professionals at AT Surgical to ease and aid with all your postural problems.
The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE comes in sizes 24-48” chest circumference and can be used by both MALE/FEMALE patients.

Features:

  • Posture aid- Using This you will immediately notice improved posture as it supports your stance, preventing slumping.
  • Wear and Adjust Yourself: Easy to put on and adjust this AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE, can be used by yourself because of the Velcro® closure technology used. Which means you can wear this “Personal Posture Corrector” without anyone’s help.
  • Comfortable Design AND LIGHT-WEIGHT: The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE is lightweight, durable and is manufactured with premium quality materials which makes it ideal to wear it all day.
    The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE is designed to straighten up, sit or stand with shoulders back; supports clavicles.
  • Convenient to carry: The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE is designed as such that it provides a discreet feeling and you will not have to feel conscious about wearing it underneath your clothes at Home or Work.
  • Recommended by Professionals: The AT 3200 CLAVICLE & SHOULDER BRACE has been manufactured by consulting professionals of AT Surgical and designed with a focus on the problem areas of the neck, shoulders, and back. AT Surgical professionals ensures that even after taking off the brace, your improved posture will last for a long period.

  • Size

  • Size Available
  • Sizes Available:
  • SMALL = 24”-33”
  • LARGE = 34”- 48”

The post Clavicle & Shoulder Brace : Posture Corrector,Aid For Injuries & Fractures, Neck Pain appeared first on AT Surgical.
